The drill stops for a moment, slowing down in the mine shaft.

Krhinos: 10000 square feet?!?!?!? Holy Diamond! That's the biggest
vein i've seen in my carreer! Do you think I'm good to drill in it
from this angle? Do you get a shape on the sonars?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> Dracon's eyes grow wide as he stares into a computer screen.
> 
> "It's...it's of MASSIVE proportions!  You're going to have to do a
little landscaping it seems, and I'd suggest taking out..." he pauses
for a moment, "I'd say about 10,000 square feet at the moment."
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Thursday, July 10, 2003 8:24 PM
>   Subject: Uncovering the treasure
> 
> 
>   On the island where the Stardrill team had set up, Krhinos was
>   foraging his way in the ground. The Energon concentration on his
>   sensors was going up regularly at an alarming rythm. This was big!
> 
>   Krhinos: Can one of you guys tell me hos big that energon vein seems
>   to be? I detect something huge down here!
>
